data.actual_result: "Open file" window remains open and puts Discord into not respoding state after it's manually closed
data.expected_result: "Open file" window should close after drag&drop or prevent drag & drop
data.short_description: Drag&Dropping a file from an "Open file" window will leave the "Open file" window open and freeze Discord when closed
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where you can upload files - Press on "+" button to open the "Open file" window - Drag&Drop one of the files from that window into Discord client - Press Upload or Cancel in Discord window
